sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: This library provides a wrapper API for the native ODBC API. It aims to do everything ODBC does, but with a much nicer interface. Anything it doesn't (yet) do can be done by retrieving the native ODBC handles and dropping down to straight ODBC C API code. For more propaganda, please see the project homepage.
